description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Carbonara With Pumpkin & Bacon Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carbonara,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower Carbonara With Pumpkin & Bacon Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 rasher bacon, rind removed, finely chopped
500g butternut pumpkin, peeled, diced into 1cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. To make the crumble, combine pumpkin, bacon, thyme and oil in a roasting pan. Season and toss well. Roast for 20 minutes or until pumpkin is golden brown and bacon turns crisp.

Meanwhile, combine cauliflower and milk in a medium saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Cover and simmer for 6 minutes or until tender. Purée, using a stick blender, until smooth. Stir in parmesan and season to taste.
Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling salted water over high heat for 8 minutes or until al dente. Drain and toss through cauliflower sauce.
Spoon pasta into serving bowls and top with crumble. Serve with extra parmesan.
